intra_panel_references.condition_description: IF 'Select the process type' is India THEN value is 'DOM IN', IF 'Select the process type' is International THEN value is 'INT'
intra_panel_references.source_logic: Not visible, IF India is selected in previous field then Values is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT.

intra_panel_references.condition_description: Dropdown values filtered based on 'Account Group/Vendor Type' selection using reference table 1.3
intra_panel_references.source_logic: Dropdown values will come based on the account group/vendor type selection field as 2nd column of reference table 1.3.

intra_panel_references.condition_description: IF 'Account Group/Vendor Type' is ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, or ZONE THEN value is 'Domestic'. IF 'Account Group/Vendor Type' is ZIMP, ZSTV, or ZDAS THEN value is 'Import'
intra_panel_references.source_logic: Default behaviour is Invisible, If account group/vendor type is selected as ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE (any one) then derived it as Domestic. If Account group/vendor type is selected as ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS (any one) then derived it as import

intra_panel_references.condition_description: IF 'Select the process type' is India THEN country is 'India' and non-editable. IF 'Select the process type' is International THEN country is a selectable dropdown
intra_panel_references.source_logic: If the Select the process type field value is India then country is India and Noneditable, If Select the process type field value is international then country is selectable dropdown. For dropdown values will be Column 2 - Column 5 of reference table 1.1.

intra_panel_references.condition_description: Derived from 'Country' selection using column 5 of reference table 1.1
intra_panel_references.source_logic: Not visible, If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 5 on table 1.1

intra_panel_references.condition_description: Derived from 'Country' selection using column 2 of reference table 1.1
intra_panel_references.source_logic: Not visible, If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 2 on table 1.1

intra_panel_references.condition_description: Dropdown values filtered based on 'Process Type' value (DOM IN or INT) using column 1 of reference table 1.2
intra_panel_references.source_logic: Dropdown values will come from column 3 based on process type filter (DOM IN or INT) as column 1 of reference table 1.2

intra_panel_references.condition_description: Mobile number validation rules depend on selected country
intra_panel_references.source_logic: Mobile Number Validation based on the country selection

referenced_fields.description: If Duplicate GST Result indicates duplicate found, Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory
If Duplicate PAN Result indicates duplicate found, Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory
If Duplicate Email Result indicates duplicate found, Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory
If Duplicate Mobile Result indicates duplicate found, Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory
If Duplicate Bank Account Number Result indicates duplicate found, Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory

intra_panel_references.logic_extracted: If duplicate vendor found based on 1. Duplicate GST 2. PAN Card 3. Email Id 4. Mobile Number 5. Bank Account Number then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory 6. Business Registration Number (Applicable only for Import and International)

referenced_fields.description: Justification field is semantically linked to the Exception Duplicate Vendor creation checkbox - justification is needed when exception is requested

intra_panel_references.logic_extracted: Implied dependency based on field naming convention - justification supports the exception request

intra_panel_references.context: Both fields share the same data source (Table 1.5) and naming convention suggests Part 2 is a continuation/supplement to the Incoterms field
intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: Dropdown values refer Table 1.5

intra_panel_references.dependency_description: Customer Code visibility and mandatory status depends on 'Is Vendor Your Customer?' field value
intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: If YES, then visible and mandatory, else hidden

conditions.then: Customer Code is visible and mandatory

conditions.when: Is Vendor Your Customer? = NO or empty
